channel.title: Posts on Gantry
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Gantry

item.title: What are you bringing aboard?
item.description: Straddled over a shipyard, a Gantry Crane is used to organize containers, and is capable of lifting the heaviest loads on the planet. In our increasingly automated world, infrastructure is code, software is containerized, and storage is cloud based. Your business has deadlines, objectives and assets that need to get places on time, every time. Let us do the heavy lifting. â€“ Gantry

item.title: Day Zero
item.description: Day Zero: Your team has decided that it is time to move virtual. There are questions whose answers only create more questions. What platform? Which Software? Who will handle it? What if it breaks? And most critical: What if we lose critical data? Start at the beginning and follow the map.

item.title: Decisions
item.description: Decision Making How do you decide what cloud is for you? Do you need compliance? Perhaps you are leaning towards Azure. Are your engineers on google? GCloud! Maybe you need your own control planes altogether!

item.title: Managed CI Pipelines
item.description: Sometimes you need a plumber to fix a leak. Other times, you need a new bathroom added. Rarely, you are building a whole house and want the job done right! The latter is our package, a DFY kubernetes instance running your services, error free!
